content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

In love since 1925

 

Spend the most romantic day of the year with your loved one in the magical ambience of the Esplanade Hotel and let divine delicacies and a dash of glamour ignite the sparks of love.

 

Surprise your loved one with a gala dinner at the lavish Zinfandel’s restaurant, raise a toast to eternal love with sparkling wine and unforgettable flavours selected by Chef Ana Grgić Tomić. The romantic atmosphere will be additionally spiced up by the Maršrutka Duet and a selection of romantic jazz classics, while the ladies will be welcomed with a small token of appreciation from the excellent local  Nikel cosmetics.

 

After dinner, settle into the cosmopolitan atmosphere of the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar and indulge in fantastic cocktails for lovers prepared for you by famous cocktail master Master Kishoni. 

 

The Gala Valentine’s dinner at Zinfandel’s Restaurant will be served on Tuesday, 14 February, and comes to €115 per person. The menu includes a glass of sparkling wine and five courses of carefully selected delicacies. The number of tables is limited. Prior table reservation at 01 45 666 44 is required.

 

To reserve a table at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, please call 01 45 666 33.

 

Take a look

  • Valentine’s Menu
  • Lovers’ Cocktails

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
